title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 82.1 - Forms for computation of constitutional tax limits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 82.1 - Forms for computation of constitutional tax limits

State Regulations

The forms to be used in the computation of the
constitutional tax limits of cities, counties and villages shall be the forms
prescribed in this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
82.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
